name: Cannonballs!
description:
Ready for a cannonballs fight? 

Grab a friend and play against each other in a best of 5 rounds game. 

Alpha version now available for download (windows/mac).

Please send me your feedback or bug reports @DaniDesa, so I can constantly improve the game! 

Don't forget to rate it! 

That's all, enjoy!

Controls:

You can squeeze together and play on one keyboard

Updates:

a0.1 (current):

  • local multiplayer on a single keyboard (+ experimental gamepads support)
  • 1 world (open ocean)
  • fixed 5 rounds play.
